name: WormBox (Beta)
description:
**Bug: When the worms are stretched they are harder to delete, try clicking the front or back end of the body**

What's New:

Fixed UI Scaling issues in the fullscreen web build and the windows version

Did some stuff with the windows build

Last Update:

-Title Screen improvement

-New (super amazing) map

Before:

-Slide

-Scaling Objects

-Settings Menu

-Toggling Controls

-More Worm Colors

-Worms are More Slippery

WormBox is a 2d physics sandbox where you can do anything you want. We plan to add more features, including a challenge mode.
